title: Franz Tost: How To Build A Racing Driver
overview: A documentary about former team principal Franz Tost and how he built up the fledgling Toro Rosso outfit into a Grand Prix winning team. How he helped nurture and grow exciting new talent into becoming future world champions. Drivers such as Max Verstappen and Sebastian Vettel! He explains his process in working with drivers, managing a growing team, and facing multiple challenges.
